caption.center: ALAN F. MacDONALD et al. v. RICHARD M. VARS et al.

opinion.posture:
The defendants' motion to dismiss plaintiffs' appeal is granted.
Mr. Justice Doris did not participate.
opinion.attorneys:
Vernon A. Harvey, Gregory F. Fater, for plaintiffs.
Moore, Virgadomo Lynch, Ltd., Joseph Palumbo, Jr., for defendants.
